comment: (summer semester) lots of small assignments but they are easy and graded leniently. prof cabage is one of the best and most understanding. grades take a while to get back, but stay on top of your work and reach out to them for questions!
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Lots of homework--Accessible outside class

comment: 100% recommend. Assignment and a quiz due weekly. Everything is covered in lectures take notes & you should have no problems. Quizzes are weekly & very easy. Gives homework passes. Wants you to be successful and answers all emails pretty promptly. Took this class with a different professor and got a D. Retook with Dr.Cabage and finished with a 98.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: I absolutely loved this course. Professor Cabage makes learning heavy subjects easy and fun. Everything is straightforward and due dates are hard to miss. If you're struggling, Professor Cabage is always there to encourage you and provide you with extra time and help. Tests are straight from the lectures. Assignments are very easy to do.

Professor Cabage is very nice and she grades nicely. it does not take her long to get back our grades, some people might consider her class a lot of work but it is easy and durable just get it done at the beginning of the week and you should be fine. Every week you have a quiz, 1 midterm, and a final.

Professor Cabage has been wonderful so far! They provide detailed feedback on assignments and are a pretty easy grader. The class itself is tough, but Professor Cabage does make it as easy as possible. Quizzes & assignments every week, a midterm & a final, as well as a research proposal. Grades are received in a timely manner most of the time.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class
